search.query: |tstats count min(_time) as firstTime max(_time) as lastTime FROM datamodel=Cloud_Infrastructure.Compute where Compute.user_type!="AssumeRole" AND Compute.event_name="ListImages" by Compute.image_id Compute.src_user Compute.src Compute.http_user_agent Compute.user_type | rename "Compute.*" as * |stats values(http_user_agent) as http_user_agent distinct_count(http_user_agent) as unique_ua_count by src_user, image_id, src, user_type | where unique_ua_count > 1
